Syntax Highlighting

  • Show All Code
  • Hide All Code
  • View Source
news
Author

Ella Kaye

Published

July 29, 2022

Let’s test some syntax highlighting!

#| label: code-demo-py
#| eval: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

import numpy as np
Toggle the code 
library(dplyr)
library(palmerpenguins)

penguins %>%
  mutate(
    long_flipper = case_when(
      species == "Adelie" & flipper_length_mm > 195 ~ TRUE,
      species == "Chinstrap" & flipper_length_mm > 200 ~ TRUE,
      species == "Gentoo" & flipper_length_mm > 225 ~ TRUE,
      TRUE ~ FALSE
    )
  )

Let's test some syntax highlighting!

```{.python}
#| label: code-demo-py
#| eval: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

import numpy as np
```

```{r}
#| label: code-demo
#| eval: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(dplyr)
library(palmerpenguins)

penguins %>%
  mutate(
    long_flipper = case_when(
      species == "Adelie" & flipper_length_mm > 195 ~ TRUE,
      species == "Chinstrap" & flipper_length_mm > 200 ~ TRUE,
      species == "Gentoo" & flipper_length_mm > 225 ~ TRUE,
      TRUE ~ FALSE
    )
  )
```
